website_summaries.verdict: This electric caulk gun is cordless and allows you to lay down many tubes of caulk in one charge.
pros: Long-lasting battery designed to dispense 200 tubes on one charge
Reduces the chance of wearing out your hands with over pumping on big jobs
Gives you better control than a manual gun
cons: This gun has a lot of power
In some cases, it delivers more power than what is needed

customer_reviews.title: Great price..simple to use and make caulking so much easier and faster
customer_reviews.text: I used for my whole driveway and it is fast and slick and you can go as fast or as slow as you want by adjusting it... Battery lasts a long time ....
customer_reviews.author: mikejohnson

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any do-it-your-selfer
customer_reviews.text: We are a property management company/Realty and do an above average amount of caulking on properties for any number of reasons and remedies. The amount of time and unnecessary hand pain a caulk gun can save is quite impactful. I believe at current we have 4 of the Ryobi Caulk guns in our arsenal. For the price and value, we couldn't be happier with this product. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Ryobi tool arsenal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity if your project includes applying some kind of adhesive either for paneling or in my case foam insulation boards. The flow adjustment is spot on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Erlach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for RV rooftop maintenace.
customer_reviews.text: So....every few years you have to re-caulk joints on the RV etc. I have 2....1 trailer and a 38' motorhome. Using the hand pump guns was a chore....but no more with this guy! Wow....I'm in love. With the adjustable feed speed it's also much easier to control the flow rate.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great tool with a low price tag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good caulking gun!! It is easy to use and the speed control is very accurate!! The price was really good compared to others. I put 12 tubes through it the first day and it worked perfectly!! I usually only use the top brand named tools, but this caulk gun is worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my dad for farthest day. We finally went to use it and the battery is bad. Not amazons or the vendors fault. They are awesome. However, Royobi just does not provide a quality product and does not stand behind their products. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: M. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: This worked like a charm. It definitely saved me a ton of time while caulking the entire exterior of a house. I would definitely recommend those item if you are in the business of caulking.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A lot less than the others and seems to work just great
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Bad merchandise
customer_reviews.text: the battery charger doesn’t work. It had been repacked in package. So it was probably returned and now I have it. This makes a big decision weather I will buy anything else off of Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: No overage.
customer_reviews.text: Should have had one long ago. Works great, graduated speed control, stops on a dime with no excess run out.
customer_reviews.author: ANON.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but does what it needs to do. Exceptional for the price.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Chalkgun
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't used it yet but appears to by good value
customer_reviews.author: Rootyrae

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you don't have to send it back
customer_reviews.text: bought this product by mistake went to send it back it was 50 bucks to send back not worth sending it back don't need the product I guess I'll have to sell it on my own. Hope I won't lose too much money
customer_reviews.author: jcdc

customer_reviews.title: Really got screwed
customer_reviews.text: I got screwed paying shipping.Had bad charger had to pay $28.00 to ship back I got nothing and I am out ove 28.00 would never do business with this co. again.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Eichelberger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it. Exactly what I needed for a large project we're working on and didn't break the bank. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony p.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be crazy but it does make the job easier
customer_reviews.author: misty harris

product_meta.title: Ryobi 18-Volt ONE+ Power Caulk Adhesive GunP310G with P163 charger and 2.00Ah battery
product_meta.description: Ryobi introduces the new and improved 18-Volt ONE+ Power Caulk and Adhesive Gun. This tool features over 500 lbs of push force to handle higher viscosity material with ease and can apply more than 200 tubes of caulk per one charged battery.
feature_bullets: Over 500 lbs. of push force to handle higher viscosity materials allow user to caulk with ease. Variable speed selector lets user adjust the discharge rate to control the bead of caulk
P163 Includes: (1) P190 18-Volt ONE+ 2.0 Ah lithium-ion compact battery, (1) P118 dual chemistry charger and an operator’s manual
Switch lock helps prevent accidental start-up. Center balanced handle for increased user comfort
200+ tubes of caulk per charged battery
All metal manual plunger rods with hook end allows user to quickly change out tubes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars56 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
